title: Determine the Shape of the Cross-Section
text: Examine the solid and determine the shape of the cross-section of the solid. It is often helpful to draw a picture if one is not provided. In this problem, the drawing is already provided for you.

title: Determine a Formula for the Cross-Section
text: Determine a formula for the area of the cross-section.

title: Integrate the Formula
text: Integrate the area formula over the appropriate interval to get the volume.
